# See https://github.com/check-spelling/check-spelling/wiki/Configuration-Examples:-excludes
(?:^|/)(?i)COPYRIGHT
(?:^|/)(?i)LICEN[CS]E
(?:^|/)package(?:-lock|)\.json$
(?:^|/)vendor/
(?:^|/)styles/
(?:^|/)cypress/
(?:^|/)src/components/home/helpers/hero-titles.json
ignore$
\.avi$
\.DS_Store$
\.ico$
\.jpe?g$
\.lock$
\.map$
\.min\.
\.mod$
\.mp[34]$
\.png$
\.wav$
^\.github/
\.eslintrc
\.svg$
